callToAction: div[class='h-full dashboard-card rounded-tr-none lg:rounded-tr-2xl rounded-tl-none rounded-br-2xl rounded-bl-2xl lg:rounded-bl-none p-6 lg:w-full text-center lg:text-left']
modal: div[class='space-y-4 text-sm text-befh-rb-gray-700 p-6 overflow-y-scroll no-scrollbar lg:max-h-128']
okayButton: button[class='bg-befh-rb-navy-700 text-sm float-right px-5 py-3 mr-6 rounded-lg text-white font-medium mt-4']
